attributes.action: Remove David Cameron from office because of dishonesty re his tax affairs
attributes.additional_details: All Mr Cameron's statements on the issue are on public record.
attributes.background: In the last week, Mr Cameron has made several statements regarding his off-shore tax arrangements. These statements have been contradictory, hypocritical and of questionable honesty. This behaviour is unacceptable in anyone in public office.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the resignation or removal of the Prime Minister is not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
